DocumentationFigure.Title: The different localizations: GUI and content language

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The editor dialogs are all shown localized in English, which is set as user preference and called workplace locale. The language of the content, or more specific the language version that is edited, is German, as you see in the "Language" switcher at the top of the editor. The locale of the content, we usually refer to as locale.
